name: Psycho Stellar
description:
This is a game where you explore the depths of space to capture sacred images

Controls:
WASDQE to rotate the spaceship
Space to move forward / take a picture
F and R to change camera zoom
P to go to HYPERSPEED
The objects on the deck are clickable

Credits:
James9270 - Coding
Noogai223 - Sprites
lau - Music + Trailer
Rjwest07 - Team Mascot
Red - Modeling, Technical Art
